pr_title: Added clean when building the project

timeline.message:
Added clean when building the project

Signed-off-by: Paolo Patierno <ppatierno@live.com>

timeline.bodyText: I think @ppatierno found out the other day that doing make clean all does nto work well because it doesn't do make clean and make all but goes by the modules first. So I guess we maybe need it as two spearate steps?
timeline.author: scholzj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -41,13 +41,13 @@ To build Strimzi from source the operator and Kafka code needs to be compiled in
 
 3. Now build the Docker images and push them to your repository on Docker Hub:
     
-        make all
+        make clean all

replies.bodyText: That's a good point but that was with the release, in this case doing clean and all together worked fine. Maybe I can put them separately just for consistency?
replies.author: ppatierno

replies.bodyText: Lol, for whatever reason I didn't realised this was your PR ... I thought Tom C opened it :-D ... so sorry for the weird sounding comment :-)
replies.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: Anyway with my last commit I put them separately :)
replies.author: ppatierno

timeline.message:
Clean and all in separate steps

Signed-off-by: Paolo Patierno <ppatierno@live.com>
